programme.title: SEAL Team
SEAL Team
Seal Team
programme.desc: SEAL Team: Created by Benjamin Cavell. With David Boreanaz, Max Thieriot, Neil Brown Jr., A.J. Buckley. The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6473344/","name":"SEAL Team","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWQxMWI3ZmYtYjQzMC00M2MyLTliN2YtMzgyZTQ2OThhZWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6473344/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"chi_town_fed"},"dateCreated":"2021-10-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not a woke show","reviewBody":"It's refreshing to see a group of testosterone packing, heterosexual-male warriors not being PC'd into submission. I'm beyond fed up with shows parading hardcore feminists while watering down the strength of men. This show displays the strength of both. Men are physically stronger than women. Women seem to be smarter than men. That's okay by me. Here you don't see 110 pound women beating up scores of 200 pound, well trained fighters, which is ludicrous every time I see that nonsense (with the exception of vampires). I'm beyond fed up with shows parading hardcore feminists while watering down the strength of men. This show displays the strength of both. Men are physically stronger than women. Women seem to be smarter than men. That's okay by me. Here you don't see 110 pound women beating up scores of 200 pound, well trained fighters, which is ludicrous every time I see that nonsense (with the exception of vampires). Here, women are fighting like warriors to hold the family together and are also providing the intel (brains) for the testosterone packing heterosexual males. They compliment each other versus compete, as it should be. If there is a noise in the house, unlike the woke crowd, I won't tell my wife it's her turn to check it out. I won't ask her to flip a coin to see who should stand between an assailant and the spouse.\n\nThe woke war on masculine heterosexual males has not impacted this show (so far in season 1). I hope this continues throughout the entirety of the show. At last! I can watch a show where people aren't confused about what nature intended. I am also grateful that the language isn't vile. What a combination!!!! Hidden within the messaging app is Textopolis, a bustling city where all your favorite emojis live, hoping to be selected by the phone's user. In this world, each emoji has only one facial expression - except for Gene, an exuberant emoji who was born without a filter and is bursting with multiple expressions. Determined to become "normal" like the other emojis, Gene enlists the help of his handy best friend Hi-5 and the notorious code breaker emoji Jailbreak. Together, they embark on an epic "app-venture" through the apps on the phone, each its own wild and fun world, to find the Code that will fix Gene. But when a greater danger threatens the phone, the fate of all emojis depends on these three unlikely friends who must save their world before it's deleted forever."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2554352/","name":"T.J. programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle
Bezsenność w Seattle
Sleepless in Seattle
programme.desc:
Sleepless in Seattle: Directed by Nora Ephron. With Tom Hanks, Ross Malinger, Rita Wilson, Victor Garber. A recently widowed man's son calls a radio talk-show in an attempt to find his father a partner." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0108160/","name":"Sleepless in Seattle","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWY1MDJkZGUtZTE2OS00ODZiLTlmNzQtMDZjNzM2ZjkwM2QxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"A recently widowed man's son calls a radio talk-show in an attempt to find his father a partner.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0108160/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"slightlymad22"},"dateCreated":"2015-02-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"I Love It","reviewBody":"I will not lie to you, I will admit right from the off that I am biased. I love this movie.

Plot In A Paragraph: Eighteen months after losing his wife, Sam (Tom Hanks) is still grieving and can't sleep. His eight year old son Jonah (Ross Malinger) misses his mother, but he wants his father to get a new wife despite Sam having not even contemplated dating again. On Christmas Eve, Jonah calls a national radio talk show and ask for a "new wife" for his Dad. Sam ends up pouring his heart out about his magical and perfect marriage to his late wife, and how much he still misses her. Among the many women who hear Sam's story and fall in love with him solely because of it is Annie Reed (Meg Ryan) a Baltimore-based newspaper writer. Who is drawn to Jim based on his story, despite already being engaged to Walter (Bill Pullman) 

1993 was a massive year for Tom Hanks with both this movie and "Philadelphia" being huge hits. Both are very different, but are equally brilliant. As is Hanks. He is heartbreakingly excellent as the widower. Amazingly the role of Annie was originally offered to Julia Roberts, who turned it down. Kim Basinger also turned it down because she thought the premise was ridiculous (Good move Kim!!) After Michelle Pfeiffer, Jennifer Jason Leigh and Jodie Foster all declined as well, Meg Ryan landed the role. I surprised this role was not wrote with Ryan in mind as this type of role was her bread and butter back then. She was perfect for this type of role. 

Rosie O Donnell is solid support to Ryan as is Bill Pullman, and Ross Malinger manages to avoid all the cliché's of most chicks actors! 

Well directed, with a sharp and witty script. I will add I also liked the fact that they didn't feel the need to make the Bill Pullman character a jerk (as is usual the case with his type of role in romantic comedies) 

One of my favourite Tom Hanks movies, one of my favourite Meg Ryan movies and one of my favourite romantic comedies. I don't own many romantic comedies. But this one is in my collection.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":169894,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"1993-06-25","keywords":"radio show,seattle washington,colleague,diner,waitress","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi727367449","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWVkYjM2MjAtYzY1ZC00MDE4LThjZTQtOGRkYjYzMDdkZTcyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWVkYjM2MjAtYzY1ZC00MDE4LThjZTQtOGRkYjYzMDdkZTcyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000158/","name":"Tom Hanks"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000212/","name":"Meg Ryan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0539678/","name":"Ross Malinger"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001188/","name":"Nora Ephron"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005883/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0033578/","name":"Jeff Arch"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001188/","name":"Nora Ephron"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0911486/","name":"David S. Ward"}],"duration":"PT1H45M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0108160, Title: Sleepless in Seattle, --- Description: Sleepless in Seattle: Directed by Nora Ephron. With Tom Hanks, Ross Malinger, Rita Wilson, Victor Garber. A recently widowed man's son calls a radio talk-show in an attempt to find his father a partner." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0108160/","name":"Sleepless in Seattle","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWY1MDJkZGUtZTE2OS00ODZiLTlmNzQtMDZjNzM2ZjkwM2QxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"A recently widowed man's son calls a radio talk-show in an attempt to find his father a partner.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0108160/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"slightlymad22","dateCreated":"2015-02-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"I Love It","reviewBody":"I will not lie to you, I will admit right from the off that I am biased. I love this movie.

Plot In A Paragraph: Eighteen months after losing his wife, Sam (Tom Hanks) is still grieving and can't sleep. His eight year old son Jonah (Ross Malinger) misses his mother, but he wants his father to get a new wife despite Sam having not even contemplated dating again. On Christmas Eve, Jonah calls a national radio talk show and ask for a "new wife" for his Dad. Sam ends up pouring his heart out about his magical and perfect marriage to his late wife, and how much he still misses her. Among the many women who hear Sam's story and fall in love with him solely because of it is Annie Reed (Meg Ryan) a Baltimore-based newspaper writer. Who is drawn to Jim based on his story, despite already being engaged to Walter (Bill Pullman) 

1993 was a massive year for Tom Hanks with both this movie and "Philadelphia" being huge hits. Both are very different, but are equally brilliant. As is Hanks. He is heartbreakingly excellent as the widower. Amazingly the role of Annie was originally offered to Julia Roberts, who turned it down. Kim Basinger also turned it down because she thought the premise was ridiculous (Good move Kim!!) After Michelle Pfeiffer, Jennifer Jason Leigh and Jodie Foster all declined as well, Meg Ryan landed the role. I surprised this role was not wrote with Ryan in mind as this type of role was her bread and butter back then. She was perfect for this type of role. 

Rosie O Donnell is solid support to Ryan as is Bill Pullman, and Ross Malinger manages to avoid all the cliché's of most chicks actors! 

Well directed, with a sharp and witty script. I will add I also liked the fact that they didn't feel the need to make the Bill Pullman character a jerk (as is usual the case with his type of role in romantic comedies) 

One of my favourite Tom Hanks movies, one of my favourite Meg Ryan movies and one of my favourite romantic comedies. I don't own many romantic comedies. But this one is in my collection.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":169894,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"1993-06-25","keywords":"radio show,seattle washington,colleague,diner,waitress","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi727367449","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWVkYjM2MjAtYzY1ZC00MDE4LThjZTQtOGRkYjYzMDdkZTcyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWVkYjM2MjAtYzY1ZC00MDE4LThjZTQtOGRkYjYzMDdkZTcyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000158/","name":"Tom Hanks","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000212/","name":"Meg Ryan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0539678/","name":"Ross Malinger"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001188/","name":"Nora Ephron"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005883/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0033578/","name":"Jeff Arch","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001188/","name":"Nora Ephron","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0911486/","name":"David S. programme.title: Peter Rabbit
Piotruś Królik
Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: Peter Rabbit: Directed by Will Gluck. With James Corden, Fayssal Bazzi, Domhnall Gleeson, Sia. Feature adaptation of Beatrix Potter's classic tale of a rebellious rabbit trying to sneak into a farmer's vegetable garden." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5117670/","name":"Peter Rabbit","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzI5MzZmZjItOGQzZC00NjNiLWFjMjQtMGNhY2NmNDMyNGM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Feature adaptation of Beatrix Potter's classic tale of a rebellious rabbit trying to sneak into a farmer's vegetable garden.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5117670/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"alvaro-a-quesada-558-141800"},"dateCreated":"2018-03-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"THIS FILM STICKS TO YOUR HEART-GET EXTRA NAPKINS AT THE CONCESSION.","reviewBody":"BRA-VO. This is a BRILLIANT film, very sweet and heartfelt. Not sure why there has been so many bad reviews and a lot of self-righteous comments--but they need to check their politics at the door, and for goodness sake--just have fun, people. Can't we just enjoy it? Why does it have to be so complicated? I can think of a million other things that are much worse--than this Peter Rabbit film, which by the way, there is nothing wrong with Peter Rabbit 3.0. Go see it. You're going to love it, as much as I would've felt the original author would have too, as this is based on her tale for kids, but it is technically a sequel--as you will understand when you see it. First off, they are rabbits, and rabbits are mischievous by nature, when they are bored or there is food at stake. They are also a bit affectionately demanding and territorial as they felt with Bea. Within the context of the film, rabbits don't understand what the implications of allergic reactions could be for humans--they are, yes, rabbits. The humor is just hilarious, and it works well coming from farm animals. This is CGI/A vs. real live humans. It kept me engaged throughout. I saw this one with my daughter and we both laughed so much and so hard -- isn't this what it is all about? a positive experience? One that brings you closer with those you are with? I cried, I laughed, I cried so hard I laughed, and laughed so hard I cried -- and this is how I rate/gauge film I watch -- by how it moves me and the positivity it inspires in me; it felt good to be reminded that I was still human. I just loved, loved, loved this film. I recommend it. This one will definitely make it into my collection once it is released in media format -- and not many make it in. The soundtrack is super amazing too--I can't stress that enough. They hit it on the head with this one. A TRUE STORY OF HUMBLENESS AND REDEMPTION. Your heart will melt into a big puddle--hands down. No one is paying me to write this--I give it 10 Gold stars. I want to see Peter win next year at the Oscars. A TOTAL GEM.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":40669,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2018-02-09","keywords":"rabbit,deer,mouse,fox,pig","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2445195289","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzc0YWQ5MzctNjM2ZS00YWNhLWFiYjktZjM3NzMxMmQwOGZkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzc0YWQ5MzctNjM2ZS00YWNhLWFiYjktZjM3NzMxMmQwOGZkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Peter's feud with Mr. McGregor escalates to greater heights than ever before as they rival for the affections of the warm-hearted animal lover who lives next door."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0179479/","name":"James Corden"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2417960/","name":"Fayssal Bazzi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1727304/","name":"Domhnall Gleeson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0323239/","name":"Will Gluck"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0605949/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005154/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1464577/","name":"Rob Lieber"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0323239/","name":"Will Gluck"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0693229/","name":"Beatrix Potter"}],"duration":"PT1H35M"}</script><metacontent="

A Knight's Tale
programme.desc:
A Knight's Tale: Directed by Brian Helgeland. With Heath Ledger, Rufus Sewell, Shannyn Sossamon, Paul Bettany. After his master dies, a peasant squire, fueled by his desire for food and glory, creates a new identity for himself as a knight." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0183790/","name":"A Knight's Tale","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTE5OTE4OTE2Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMDkzMTQ3._V1_.jpg","description":"After his master dies, a peasant squire, fueled by his desire for food and glory, creates a new identity for himself as a knight.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0183790/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"HelenMary"},"dateCreated":"2013-08-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"This film was weighed measured and not found wanting at all","reviewBody":"This film shows without any quibbling just how bright the star of Heath Ledger was. He is luminous in this; beautiful, funny, physical and engaging. He plays excellently against the stunning Shannyn Sossamon, who fits perfectly into the modern medieval setting of this film. Set in the C14th a man of poor birth but sharp intellect rises through the ranks of page-dom with the desire to become a nobleman for food, fame, glory and love.

An impressive ensemble cast including the superior Paul Bettany (Chaucer - you can see he had fun with this rather exposing (!) role), Rufus Sewell, Mark Addy, Christopher Cazenove, James Purefoy and Alan Tudyk provides a film that is nigh-on flawless for cinematography that is exciting and gripping, the screenplay - the script - is amazing, laugh out loud funny all the way through. It's one of those films which require certain intelligence to get all the asides and witticisms, or numerous viewings to pick up on all of them, otherwise its still a funny and enjoyable film. With something for everyone this film is a joy to watch again and again, it's also attractive visually - many points to the costumers who mixed historical fashion with a modern edgy almost punk twist. Ditto the soundtrack - mixing in modern music was a clever touch, similar to Romeo and Juliet (Baz Luhrmann), and also an interesting look at fame and the cult of celebrity. 

A great viewing experience which sometimes even brings a tear to my eye. If you don't enjoy this film, there's something wrong with you. Ignore the haters, it's not supposed to be historically accurate or high-brow! Sometimes a feel-good, comfortable, Disney-esque story arc is just what you want.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":180837,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Romance"],"datePublished":"2001-10-24","keywords":"medieval times,knight,jousting,london england,chaucer","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"A Knight's Tale","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2427715865","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDkxMzRmODYtOTRmMy00ZjQwLTk4MjAtNDQ5YjQ2NTZjZDgxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDkxMzRmODYtOTRmMy00ZjQwLTk4MjAtNDQ5YjQ2NTZjZDgxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Columbia Pictures"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005132/","name":"Heath Ledger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004692/","name":"Mark Addy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001722/","name":"Rufus Sewell"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001338/","name":"Brian Helgeland"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0035535/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0031304/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001338/","name":"Brian Helgeland"}],"duration":"PT2H12M"}</script><metacontent="

After his master dies, a peasant squire, fueled by his desire for food and glory, creates a new identity for himself as a knight." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0183790/","name":"A Knight's Tale","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTE5OTE4OTE2Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMDkzMTQ3._V1_.jpg","description":"After his master dies, a peasant squire, fueled by his desire for food and glory, creates a new identity for himself as a knight.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0183790/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"HelenMary","dateCreated":"2013-08-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"This film was weighed measured and not found wanting at all","reviewBody":"This film shows without any quibbling just how bright the star of Heath Ledger was. He is luminous in this; beautiful, funny, physical and engaging. He plays excellently against the stunning Shannyn Sossamon, who fits perfectly into the modern medieval setting of this film. Set in the C14th a man of poor birth but sharp intellect rises through the ranks of page-dom with the desire to become a nobleman for food, fame, glory and love.

An impressive ensemble cast including the superior Paul Bettany (Chaucer - you can see he had fun with this rather exposing (!) role), Rufus Sewell, Mark Addy, Christopher Cazenove, James Purefoy and Alan Tudyk provides a film that is nigh-on flawless for cinematography that is exciting and gripping, the screenplay - the script - is amazing, laugh out loud funny all the way through. It's one of those films which require certain intelligence to get all the asides and witticisms, or numerous viewings to pick up on all of them, otherwise its still a funny and enjoyable film. With something for everyone this film is a joy to watch again and again, it's also attractive visually - many points to the costumers who mixed historical fashion with a modern edgy almost punk twist. Ditto the soundtrack - mixing in modern music was a clever touch, similar to Romeo and Juliet (Baz Luhrmann), and also an interesting look at fame and the cult of celebrity. 

A great viewing experience which sometimes even brings a tear to my eye. If you don't enjoy this film, there's something wrong with you. Ignore the haters, it's not supposed to be historically accurate or high-brow! Sometimes a feel-good, comfortable, Disney-esque story arc is just what you want.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":180837,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Romance"],"datePublished":"2001-10-24","keywords":"medieval times,knight,jousting,london england,chaucer","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"A Knight's Tale","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2427715865","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDkxMzRmODYtOTRmMy00ZjQwLTk4MjAtNDQ5YjQ2NTZjZDgxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDkxMzRmODYtOTRmMy00ZjQwLTk4MjAtNDQ5YjQ2NTZjZDgxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Columbia Pictures","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005132/","name":"Heath Ledger","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004692/","name":"Mark Addy","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001722/","name":"Rufus Sewell"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001338/","name":"Brian Helgeland"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0035535/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0031304/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001338/","name":"Brian Helgeland"],"duration":"PT2H12M"</script><metacontent="

Bad Boys II
programme.desc: Bad Boys II: Directed by Michael Bay. With Martin Lawrence, Will Smith, Jordi Mollà, Gabrielle Union. Two loose-cannon narcotics cops investigate the flow of Ecstasy into Florida from a Cuban drug cartel." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0172156/","name":"Bad Boys II","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmU4NzVkZjEtZmQxMi00ZDY5LWI3ZDYtMWRmZjE5YmYwZjQzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two loose-cannon narcotics cops investigate the flow of Ecstasy into Florida from a Cuban drug cartel.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0172156/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"questl-18592"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Bay Boys 2: Bay Harder","reviewBody":"Bad Boys 2 is basically what you'd expect. Everything from the original gets amped up. The story is more ridiculous and less contained. There's no restraint here just pure Bay indulgence. This movie is bonkers but it knows exactly what it is and doesn't pretend to be anything it's not. I can respect that and I appreciate this movie more than the original for that very reason.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":242400,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"2003-09-10","keywords":"cuba,police,miami florida,sequel,anti hero","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bad Boys 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2360869145","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjEzY2QyYzItZjBmYS00MzgzLTllYmEtNzZhYjEwNGRlNjljXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjEzY2QyYzItZjBmYS00MzgzLTllYmEtNzZhYjEwNGRlNjljXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Columbia Tristar"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000226/","name":"Will Smith"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001454/","name":"Martin Lawrence"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005517/","name":"Gabrielle Union"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000881/","name":"Michael Bay"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102770/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0038663/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0303032/","name":"George Gallo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0926729/","name":"Marianne Wibberley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0926727/","name":"Cormac Wibberley"}],"duration":"PT2H27M"}</script><metacontent="

Patolog
Harrow
programme.desc: Harrow: Created by Stephen M. Irwin, Leigh McGrath. With Ioan Gruffudd, Darren Gilshenan, Damien Garvey, Ella Newton. Harrow tells the story of Dr. Daniel Harrow, a forensic pathologist with a total disregard for authority." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7242816/","name":"Harrow","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY2MzczNjMwM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDcxMTE4NDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Harrow tells the story of Dr. Daniel Harrow, a forensic pathologist with a total disregard for authority.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7242816/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"oliviamteller"},"dateCreated":"2018-03-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"More please.","reviewBody":"While I can't speak to the authenticity of Australian location portrayal, as other reviewers have, I think the show was great. Acting, camera work, jokes, and banter between coworkers, all served to create a believable environment. And that dark past of his, just waiting to be revealed and possibly destroy everything, hovers in the background, creating tension. I find myself waiting for the next episode. One reviewer complains about there being a personal story behind the main character, but that's how we end up finding out about that mysterious past of his. And, seriously, what do they want? A cardboard cutout character with minimal lines and no home life? The added drama keeps the show interesting, adds extra levels to the character as it goes, and family members are always potentially at risk when there's a hero character involved, so there's that. Give the show a chance and don't pay attention to bad reviews if you already think you might like something.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7057,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2018-03-09","keywords":"doctor,caucasian,latex gloves,forensic pathologist,dead body","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0344435/","name":"Ioan Gruffudd"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0319696/","name":"Darren Gilshenan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0960946/","name":"Damien Garvey"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0110425/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2207641/","name":"Stephen M. Irwin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0569838/","name":"Leigh McGrath"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Harrow","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi709605401","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGU2NjZmNjEtMTY1Ni00YjY5LTgwNzItMzNlMDU0YjFlNWEwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGU2NjZmNjEtMTY1Ni00YjY5LTgwNzItMzNlMDU0YjFlNWEwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Ioan Gruffudd stars as Daniel Harrow, a brilliant forensic pathologist who solves the cases others can't. #HarrowABC"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Harrow: Created by Stephen M. Irwin, Leigh McGrath. With Ioan Gruffudd, Darren Gilshenan, Damien Garvey, Ella Newton. Harrow tells the story of Dr. Daniel Harrow, a forensic pathologist with a total disregard for authority." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7242816/","name":"Harrow","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY2MzczNjMwM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDcxMTE4NDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Harrow tells the story of Dr. Daniel Harrow, a forensic pathologist with a total disregard for authority.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7242816/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"oliviamteller"},"dateCreated":"2018-03-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"More please.","reviewBody":"While I can't speak to the authenticity of Australian location portrayal, as other reviewers have, I think the show was great. Acting, camera work, jokes, and banter between coworkers, all served to create a believable environment. And that dark past of his, just waiting to be revealed and possibly destroy everything, hovers in the background, creating tension. I find myself waiting for the next episode. One reviewer complains about there being a personal story behind the main character, but that's how we end up finding out about that mysterious past of his. And, seriously, what do they want? A cardboard cutout character with minimal lines and no home life? The added drama keeps the show interesting, adds extra levels to the character as it goes, and family members are always potentially at risk when there's a hero character involved, so there's that. Give the show a chance and don't pay attention to bad reviews if you already think you might like something.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7057,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2018-03-09","keywords":"doctor,caucasian,latex gloves,forensic pathologist,dead body","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0344435/","name":"Ioan Gruffudd"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0319696/","name":"Darren Gilshenan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0960946/","name":"Damien Garvey"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0110425/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2207641/","name":"Stephen M. programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.desc: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. programme.category: Comedy, Crime, Drama, Comedy, Crime, Drama
programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 2819924, Title: Candice Renoir, --- Description: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. programme.desc: Profilage: Created by Fanny Robert, Sophie Lebarbier. With Jean-Michel Martial, Raphaël Ferret, Philippe Bas, Valérie Dashwood. Chloé Saint-Laurent is a profiler and works with a police team to solve murders in Paris. She's very sweet, she wears very colored clothes and a huge yellow bag. She looks like a little girl who needs a doll, but she's very smart and a very good profiler. Step by step, she fits in the team and her colleagues, very reserved at first, become her best friends." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1418572/","name":"Profilage","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWY0ZmE1ZWQtNjEzNy00YWE0LTkzOTgtNjc3MjQ2NWQ4YzYxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTI2OTA2NTEw._V1_.jpg","description":"Chloé Saint-Laurent is a profiler and works with a police team to solve murders in Paris. With Jean-Michel Martial, Raphaël Ferret, Philippe Bas, Valérie Dashwood. Chloé Saint-Laurent is a profiler and works with a police team to solve murders in Paris. She's very sweet, she wears very colored clothes and a huge yellow bag. She looks like a little girl who needs a doll, but she's very smart and a very good profiler. Step by step, she fits in the team and her colleagues, very reserved at first, become her best friends." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1418572/","name":"Profilage","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWY0ZmE1ZWQtNjEzNy00YWE0LTkzOTgtNjc3MjQ2NWQ4YzYxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTI2OTA2NTEw._V1_.jpg","description":"Chloé Saint-Laurent is a profiler and works with a police team to solve murders in Paris. programme.title: "Flower Shop Mysteries" Mum's the Word
Tajemnice kwiaciarni: Nie mów nikomu
Flower Shop Mystery: Mum's the Word
programme.desc:
Mum's the Word: Directed by Bradley Walsh. With Brooke Shields, Brennan Elliott, Beau Bridges, Kate Drummond. Abby Knight returns to her small home town as a NYC lawyer. On the day of her flower shop opening, her car gets damaged by someone fleeing a murder scene. She soon meets a charming bartender and partners with him in the search for answers." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVEpisode","url":"/title/tt5211694/","name":"Mum's the Word","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA0MzgxODIxODReQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDM2MTk1Njcx._V1_.jpg","description":"Abby Knight returns to her small home town as a NYC lawyer. On the day of her flower shop opening, her car gets damaged by someone fleeing a murder scene. She soon meets a charming bartender and partners with him in the search for an","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5211694/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"cgvsluis"},"dateCreated":"2021-06-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"I was just window shopping, you can actually buy.","reviewBody":"Abby, our former lawyer turned meddling flower shop owner, runs in to former high school date Elvis Jones when he pan handles her in the morning just as Abby is opening her shop. Elvis is a bit down on his luck, having just got out of prison for theft. Abby remembers Elvis as being a gentleman back in the day and gives him $10...and an uplifting thought...

"I kind of look at life like Lilies, their perennial. If they don't bloom one year, they always have next year. They always have another chance."-Abby

"I hate mums!"

Later that day, Abby witnesses someone running out of the alley, who then gets into the suv behind her and hits her car in a hit and run situation. Abby gets the plate and in her first meeting with the new bar owner next door, Marco, she gets him to agree to use a contact to find out who the car owner is.

"I think I won that round. I think I am going to like this game."-Marco.

As it turns out, a dead body is found on the other end of the alley and Abby's hit and run perpetrator could be a suspect. Abby starts to get involved when she hears that the number one suspect is none other than Elvis, who she can't believe would ever kill anyone.

"Your assignment, Abby, is to go back to work and stay out of trouble."-Marco

Abby and Marco start to become partners...and great partners they are!

"Now that you have G. I. Joe to protect you."-Nikki.

"Don't say a word? Were you afraid the little lady was going to beat her gums?"-Abby.

"You are just like your mother, Abby. Heart of gold, spine of steel."-Abby's Dad.

This isn't my favorite of the Hallmark mysteries, but the banter is really good and the mystery itself was decent. Worth a watch.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1055,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"TV-G","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2016-01-17","keywords":"murder","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Flower Shop Mystery: Mum's the Word","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2751446809","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDZjZGEwNjktMWJhNS00ZDgxLTkxYTYtMWU5MDI5ZTMwNTRhXkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDZjZGEwNjktMWJhNS00ZDgxLTkxYTYtMWU5MDI5ZTMwNTRhXkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer 1"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000222/","name":"Brooke Shields"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0254392/","name":"Brennan Elliott"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000977/","name":"Beau Bridges"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0909568/","name":"Bradley Walsh"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0408514/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7739636/","name":"Kate Collins"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0326211/","name":"Gary Goldstein"}],"duration":"PT1H23M","timeRequired":"PT1H23M"}</script><metacontent="

"Don't say a word? Were you afraid the little lady was going to beat her gums?"-Abby.

"You are just like your mother, Abby. Heart of gold, spine of steel."-Abby's Dad.

This isn't my favorite of the Hallmark mysteries, but the banter is really good and the mystery itself was decent. Worth a watch.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1055,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3,"contentRating":"TV-G","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2016-01-17","keywords":"murder","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Flower Shop Mystery: Mum's the Word","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2751446809","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDZjZGEwNjktMWJhNS00ZDgxLTkxYTYtMWU5MDI5ZTMwNTRhXkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDZjZGEwNjktMWJhNS00ZDgxLTkxYTYtMWU5MDI5ZTMwNTRhXkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer 1","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000222/","name":"Brooke Shields","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0254392/","name":"Brennan Elliott","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000977/","name":"Beau Bridges"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0909568/","name":"Bradley Walsh"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0408514/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7739636/","name":"Kate Collins","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0326211/","name":"Gary Goldstein"],"duration":"PT1H23M","timeRequired":"PT1H23M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: "Flower Shop Mysteries" Dearly Depotted
Tajemnice kwiaciarni: Morderstwo na weselu
Flower Shop Mystery: Dearly Depotted
programme.desc:
Dearly Depotted: Directed by Bradley Walsh. With Brooke Shields, Brennan Elliott, Beau Bridges, Kate Drummond. Abby Knight, ex-lawyer, crime buff and owner of Bloomers Flower Shop, is having a week to be reckoned with. A reluctant bridesmaid at wedding, Abby ends up not just doing the flowers, but having to find out who murdered a wedding crasher." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVEpisode","url":"/title/tt5541330/","name":"Dearly Depotted","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjQ5NGVmMTItOTdmNC00ODE1LWJkOGItNjA2MTExNjQ0NGYyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDM3MjU4MjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Abby Knight, ex-lawyer, crime buff and owner of Bloomers Flower Shop, is having a week to be reckoned with. A reluctant bridesmaid at wedding, Abby ends up not just doing the flowers, but having to find out who murdered a wedding cra","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5541330/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"carolynocean"},"dateCreated":"2021-05-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Very Enjoyable Mystery","reviewBody":"I really liked this trilogy, I saw the previous two episodes a few weeks ago.

So , I decided to write a combined review of all.

Each one really worked , the characters are so likeable , but I see that Brooke Shields is getting a fair bit of criticism regarding her appearance !

Hey I wish I could look like that , she's georgous , why does everybody have to look younger and perfect all the time ?

There is nothing wooden about her ,, like so many other actresses in similar roles .

So, back to the movies.... The plotlines were good, scripts were, good, and well acted by both Brooke and her very nice boyfriend played by Brennan Elliot, It's nice when the leading sleuths are more natural, I really got a good vibe from all the cast here !

To sum them up.......... Easy watching and good mysteries that kept me guessing along the way.

Would like if they made some more !!!.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":830,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"TV-G","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2016-06-26","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Flower Shop Mystery: Dearly Depotted","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3187654425","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjJhZTI5MzUtM2U3MC00YzU4LThiOTktYjMzYTAyNWM1NzBkXkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjJhZTI5MzUtM2U3MC00YzU4LThiOTktYjMzYTAyNWM1NzBkXkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer 1"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000222/","name":"Brooke Shields"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0254392/","name":"Brennan Elliott"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000977/","name":"Beau Bridges"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0909568/","name":"Bradley Walsh"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0408514/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0575177/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7739636/","name":"Kate Collins"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0229800/","name":"Neal H. programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.desc: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 2819924, Title: Candice Renoir, --- Description: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. IMDb data; ttnr: 2819924, Title: Candice Renoir, --- Description: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Major Case Response Team, led by Special Agent Leroy Jethro Gibbs." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0364845/","name":"NCIS: Naval Criminal Investigative Service","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjVlMjZhYzYtOGQxNC00OTQxLTk2NzEtMWFmMmNhODA4YjYzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjQ3MDgwNjY@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Naval Criminal Investigative Service's Washington, D.C. Major Case Response Team, led by Special Agent Leroy Jethro Gibbs.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0364845/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"shellemk"},"dateCreated":"2004-09-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Time flies when you're enjoying yourself","reviewBody":"and each episode speeds along all too quickly! I LOVE this show ! What is there NOT to like? Rich story lines, strongly portrayed (and very human) personalities you can really warm to who play off each other brilliantly, all with their own distinctive quirks and  above all  the always wonderful Mark Harmon as main character! What more could you ask for in a show?! There's not a single character I'd change  none that irritate  they're all excellent. I consider it a bonus that it's the one thing on TV that all our family equally enjoy for different reasons. Even my father-in-law likes this and we normally have totally different viewing preferences! I was delighted when I heard that there was a second series imminent. Only problem is that living in England, who knows how long after it's shown in the US we'll get to see it! Fortunately it's worth the wait!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":134442,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2003-09-23","keywords":"goth girl,babe scientist,special agent,naval criminal investigative service,police procedural","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001319/","name":"Mark Harmon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0564724/","name":"David McCallum"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0615266/","name":"Sean Murray"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0114905/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0066107/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0069074/","name":"Donald P. Major Case Response Team, led by Special Agent Leroy Jethro Gibbs.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0364845/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"shellemk","dateCreated":"2004-09-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Time flies when you're enjoying yourself","reviewBody":"and each episode speeds along all too quickly! I LOVE this show ! What is there NOT to like? Rich story lines, strongly portrayed (and very human) personalities you can really warm to who play off each other brilliantly, all with their own distinctive quirks and  above all  the always wonderful Mark Harmon as main character! What more could you ask for in a show?! There's not a single character I'd change  none that irritate  they're all excellent. I consider it a bonus that it's the one thing on TV that all our family equally enjoy for different reasons. Even my father-in-law likes this and we normally have totally different viewing preferences! I was delighted when I heard that there was a second series imminent. Only problem is that living in England, who knows how long after it's shown in the US we'll get to see it! I LOVE this show ! What is there NOT to like? Rich story lines, strongly portrayed (and very human) personalities you can really warm to who play off each other brilliantly, all with their own distinctive quirks and  above all  the always wonderful Mark Harmon as main character! What more could you ask for in a show?! There's not a single character I'd change  none that irritate  they're all excellent. I consider it a bonus that it's the one thing on TV that all our family equally enjoy for different reasons. programme.desc: Profilage: Created by Fanny Robert, Sophie Lebarbier. With Jean-Michel Martial, Raphaël Ferret, Philippe Bas, Valérie Dashwood. Chloé Saint-Laurent is a profiler and works with a police team to solve murders in Paris. She's very sweet, she wears very colored clothes and a huge yellow bag. She looks like a little girl who needs a doll, but she's very smart and a very good profiler. Step by step, she fits in the team and her colleagues, very reserved at first, become her best friends." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1418572/","name":"Profilage","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWY0ZmE1ZWQtNjEzNy00YWE0LTkzOTgtNjc3MjQ2NWQ4YzYxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTI2OTA2NTEw._V1_.jpg","description":"Chloé Saint-Laurent is a profiler and works with a police team to solve murders in Paris. programme.title: "Flower Shop Mysteries" Mum's the Word
Tajemnice kwiaciarni: Bukiet
Flower Shop Mystery: Snipped in the Bud
programme.desc:
Mum's the Word: Directed by Bradley Walsh. With Brooke Shields, Brennan Elliott, Beau Bridges, Kate Drummond. Abby Knight returns to her small home town as a NYC lawyer. On the day of her flower shop opening, her car gets damaged by someone fleeing a murder scene. She soon meets a charming bartender and partners with him in the search for answers." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVEpisode","url":"/title/tt5211694/","name":"Mum's the Word","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA0MzgxODIxODReQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDM2MTk1Njcx._V1_.jpg","description":"Abby Knight returns to her small home town as a NYC lawyer. On the day of her flower shop opening, her car gets damaged by someone fleeing a murder scene. She soon meets a charming bartender and partners with him in the search for an","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5211694/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"cgvsluis"},"dateCreated":"2021-06-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"I was just window shopping, you can actually buy.","reviewBody":"Abby, our former lawyer turned meddling flower shop owner, runs in to former high school date Elvis Jones when he pan handles her in the morning just as Abby is opening her shop. Elvis is a bit down on his luck, having just got out of prison for theft. Abby remembers Elvis as being a gentleman back in the day and gives him $10...and an uplifting thought...

"I kind of look at life like Lilies, their perennial. If they don't bloom one year, they always have next year. They always have another chance."-Abby

"I hate mums!"

Later that day, Abby witnesses someone running out of the alley, who then gets into the suv behind her and hits her car in a hit and run situation. Abby gets the plate and in her first meeting with the new bar owner next door, Marco, she gets him to agree to use a contact to find out who the car owner is.

"I think I won that round. I think I am going to like this game."-Marco.

As it turns out, a dead body is found on the other end of the alley and Abby's hit and run perpetrator could be a suspect. Abby starts to get involved when she hears that the number one suspect is none other than Elvis, who she can't believe would ever kill anyone.

"Your assignment, Abby, is to go back to work and stay out of trouble."-Marco

Abby and Marco start to become partners...and great partners they are!

"Now that you have G. I. Joe to protect you."-Nikki.

"Don't say a word? Were you afraid the little lady was going to beat her gums?"-Abby.

"You are just like your mother, Abby. Heart of gold, spine of steel."-Abby's Dad.

This isn't my favorite of the Hallmark mysteries, but the banter is really good and the mystery itself was decent. IMDb data; ttnr: 5211694, Title: "Flower Shop Mysteries" Mum's the Word, --- Description: Mum's the Word: Directed by Bradley Walsh. With Brooke Shields, Brennan Elliott, Beau Bridges, Kate Drummond. Abby Knight returns to her small home town as a NYC lawyer. On the day of her flower shop opening, her car gets damaged by someone fleeing a murder scene. She soon meets a charming bartender and partners with him in the search for answers." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVEpisode","url":"/title/tt5211694/","name":"Mum's the Word","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA0MzgxODIxODReQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDM2MTk1Njcx._V1_.jpg","description":"Abby Knight returns to her small home town as a NYC lawyer. On the day of her flower shop opening, her car gets damaged by someone fleeing a murder scene. She soon meets a charming bartender and partners with him in the search for an","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5211694/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"cgvsluis","dateCreated":"2021-06-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"I was just window shopping, you can actually buy.","reviewBody":"Abby, our former lawyer turned meddling flower shop owner, runs in to former high school date Elvis Jones when he pan handles her in the morning just as Abby is opening her shop. Elvis is a bit down on his luck, having just got out of prison for theft. Abby remembers Elvis as being a gentleman back in the day and gives him $10...and an uplifting thought...

"I kind of look at life like Lilies, their perennial. If they don't bloom one year, they always have next year. They always have another chance."-Abby

"I hate mums!"

Later that day, Abby witnesses someone running out of the alley, who then gets into the suv behind her and hits her car in a hit and run situation. Abby gets the plate and in her first meeting with the new bar owner next door, Marco, she gets him to agree to use a contact to find out who the car owner is.

"I think I won that round. I think I am going to like this game."-Marco.

As it turns out, a dead body is found on the other end of the alley and Abby's hit and run perpetrator could be a suspect. Abby starts to get involved when she hears that the number one suspect is none other than Elvis, who she can't believe would ever kill anyone.

"Your assignment, Abby, is to go back to work and stay out of trouble."-Marco

Abby and Marco start to become partners...and great partners they are!

"Now that you have G. I. Joe to protect you."-Nikki.

"Don't say a word? Were you afraid the little lady was going to beat her gums?"-Abby.

"You are just like your mother, Abby. Heart of gold, spine of steel."-Abby's Dad.

This isn't my favorite of the Hallmark mysteries, but the banter is really good and the mystery itself was decent. Worth a watch.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1055,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3,"contentRating":"TV-G","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2016-01-17","keywords":"murder","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Flower Shop Mystery: Mum's the Word","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2751446809","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDZjZGEwNjktMWJhNS00ZDgxLTkxYTYtMWU5MDI5ZTMwNTRhXkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDZjZGEwNjktMWJhNS00ZDgxLTkxYTYtMWU5MDI5ZTMwNTRhXkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer 1","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000222/","name":"Brooke Shields","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0254392/","name":"Brennan Elliott","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000977/","name":"Beau Bridges"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0909568/","name":"Bradley Walsh"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0408514/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7739636/","name":"Kate Collins","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0326211/","name":"Gary Goldstein"],"duration":"PT1H23M","timeRequired":"PT1H23M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Shield
The Shield
Świat gliniarzy
The Shield
programme.desc: The Shield: Created by Shawn Ryan. With Michael Chiklis, Michael Jace, Jay Karnes, CCH Pounder. Follows the lives and cases of a dirty Los Angeles Police Department cop and the unit under his command." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0286486/","name":"The Shield","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTcwNzQwODI5NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzQxMjI5MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follows the lives and cases of a dirty Los Angeles Police Department cop and the unit under his command.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0286486/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"danielcereto"},"dateCreated":"2020-07-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Shield on 2020","reviewBody":"I just finished this series today on July 2020 and all I have to say is that it does not look cheap, old or non interesting, just keeping in mind this was filmed between 2002-2008. First, most of the main cast are extremely good actors. Vic, Aceveda and Shane were the most powerful. Second, the storyline and the length of the chapters are quite good too. Probably the story could have been told with 4-5 seasons easily. But it is what it is. Last, camera work, make up and sound are pretty cool. I can't believe this show started on 2002. On the other hand, seems some characters were not fully developed or look like the writers didn't want to give them credit. But not a big thing. So, overall if you're looking for an excellent cops show, brutal, raw and almost perfect, this one is for you. Now, I'm going to watch The Wire. I want to compare both shows and see which one is better.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":77198,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.7},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2002-03-12","keywords":"corrupt cop,los angeles california,made for cable tv,mayor,drugs","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004821/","name":"Michael Chiklis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0413052/","name":"Michael Jace"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0439813/","name":"Jay Karnes"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0086397/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0203234/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056447/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0752841/","name":"Shawn Ryan"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Shield: Season Seven","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi425591577","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI1NjYxNjgtYmIzYy00ZmUzLTllNjMtMzA3MDMwMDAxZmQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI1NjYxNjgtYmIzYy00ZmUzLTllNjMtMzA3MDMwMDAxZmQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home video trailer for the final season of this cop show"}}</script><metacontent="

On the other hand, seems some characters were not fully developed or look like the writers didn't want to give them credit. But not a big thing. So, overall if you're looking for an excellent cops show, brutal, raw and almost perfect, this one is for you. Now, I'm going to watch The Wire. I want to compare both shows and see which one is better.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":77198,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.7,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2002-03-12","keywords":"corrupt cop,los angeles california,made for cable tv,mayor,drugs","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004821/","name":"Michael Chiklis","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0413052/","name":"Michael Jace","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0439813/","name":"Jay Karnes"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0086397/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0203234/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056447/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0752841/","name":"Shawn Ryan"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Shield: Season Seven","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi425591577","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI1NjYxNjgtYmIzYy00ZmUzLTllNjMtMzA3MDMwMDAxZmQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI1NjYxNjgtYmIzYy00ZmUzLTllNjMtMzA3MDMwMDAxZmQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home video trailer for the final season of this cop show"</script><metacontent="

Major Case Response Team, led by Special Agent Leroy Jethro Gibbs.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0364845/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"shellemk"},"dateCreated":"2004-09-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Time flies when you're enjoying yourself","reviewBody":"and each episode speeds along all too quickly! I LOVE this show ! What is there NOT to like? Rich story lines, strongly portrayed (and very human) personalities you can really warm to who play off each other brilliantly, all with their own distinctive quirks and  above all  the always wonderful Mark Harmon as main character! What more could you ask for in a show?! There's not a single character I'd change  none that irritate  they're all excellent. I consider it a bonus that it's the one thing on TV that all our family equally enjoy for different reasons. Even my father-in-law likes this and we normally have totally different viewing preferences! I was delighted when I heard that there was a second series imminent. Only problem is that living in England, who knows how long after it's shown in the US we'll get to see it! First, most of the main cast are extremely good actors. Vic, Aceveda and Shane were the most powerful. Second, the storyline and the length of the chapters are quite good too. Probably the story could have been told with 4-5 seasons easily. But it is what it is. Last, camera work, make up and sound are pretty cool. I can't believe this show started on 2002. On the other hand, seems some characters were not fully developed or look like the writers didn't want to give them credit. But not a big thing. programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0286486, Title: The Shield, --- Description: The Shield: Created by Shawn Ryan. With Michael Chiklis, Michael Jace, Jay Karnes, CCH Pounder. Follows the lives and cases of a dirty Los Angeles Police Department cop and the unit under his command." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0286486/","name":"The Shield","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTcwNzQwODI5NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzQxMjI5MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follows the lives and cases of a dirty Los Angeles Police Department cop and the unit under his command.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0286486/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"danielcereto","dateCreated":"2020-07-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Shield on 2020","reviewBody":"I just finished this series today on July 2020 and all I have to say is that it does not look cheap, old or non interesting, just keeping in mind this was filmed between 2002-2008. First, most of the main cast are extremely good actors. Vic, Aceveda and Shane were the most powerful. Second, the storyline and the length of the chapters are quite good too. Probably the story could have been told with 4-5 seasons easily. But it is what it is. Last, camera work, make up and sound are pretty cool. I can't believe this show started on 2002. On the other hand, seems some characters were not fully developed or look like the writers didn't want to give them credit. But not a big thing. So, overall if you're looking for an excellent cops show, brutal, raw and almost perfect, this one is for you. Now, I'm going to watch The Wire. I want to compare both shows and see which one is better.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":77198,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.7,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2002-03-12","keywords":"corrupt cop,los angeles california,made for cable tv,mayor,drugs","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004821/","name":"Michael Chiklis","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0413052/","name":"Michael Jace","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0439813/","name":"Jay Karnes"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0086397/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0203234/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056447/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0752841/","name":"Shawn Ryan"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Shield: Season Seven","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi425591577","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI1NjYxNjgtYmIzYy00ZmUzLTllNjMtMzA3MDMwMDAxZmQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI1NjYxNjgtYmIzYy00ZmUzLTllNjMtMzA3MDMwMDAxZmQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home video trailer for the final season of this cop show"</script><metacontent="

Follows the lives and cases of a dirty Los Angeles Police Department cop and the unit under his command." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0286486/","name":"The Shield","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTcwNzQwODI5NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzQxMjI5MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follows the lives and cases of a dirty Los Angeles Police Department cop and the unit under his command.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0286486/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"danielcereto"},"dateCreated":"2020-07-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Shield on 2020","reviewBody":"I just finished this series today on July 2020 and all I have to say is that it does not look cheap, old or non interesting, just keeping in mind this was filmed between 2002-2008. First, most of the main cast are extremely good actors. Vic, Aceveda and Shane were the most powerful. Second, the storyline and the length of the chapters are quite good too. Probably the story could have been told with 4-5 seasons easily. But it is what it is. Last, camera work, make up and sound are pretty cool. I can't believe this show started on 2002. On the other hand, seems some characters were not fully developed or look like the writers didn't want to give them credit. But not a big thing. So, overall if you're looking for an excellent cops show, brutal, raw and almost perfect, this one is for you. Now, I'm going to watch The Wire. programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0286486, Title: The Shield, --- Description: The Shield: Created by Shawn Ryan. With Michael Chiklis, Michael Jace, Jay Karnes, CCH Pounder. Follows the lives and cases of a dirty Los Angeles Police Department cop and the unit under his command." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0286486/","name":"The Shield","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTcwNzQwODI5NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzQxMjI5MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follows the lives and cases of a dirty Los Angeles Police Department cop and the unit under his command.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0286486/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"danielcereto","dateCreated":"2020-07-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Shield on 2020","reviewBody":"I just finished this series today on July 2020 and all I have to say is that it does not look cheap, old or non interesting, just keeping in mind this was filmed between 2002-2008. First, most of the main cast are extremely good actors. Vic, Aceveda and Shane were the most powerful. Second, the storyline and the length of the chapters are quite good too. Probably the story could have been told with 4-5 seasons easily. But it is what it is. Last, camera work, make up and sound are pretty cool. I can't believe this show started on 2002. On the other hand, seems some characters were not fully developed or look like the writers didn't want to give them credit. But not a big thing. So, overall if you're looking for an excellent cops show, brutal, raw and almost perfect, this one is for you. Now, I'm going to watch The Wire. I want to compare both shows and see which one is better.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":77198,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.7,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2002-03-12","keywords":"corrupt cop,los angeles california,made for cable tv,mayor,drugs","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004821/","name":"Michael Chiklis","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0413052/","name":"Michael Jace","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0439813/","name":"Jay Karnes"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0086397/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0203234/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056447/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0752841/","name":"Shawn Ryan"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Shield: Season Seven","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi425591577","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI1NjYxNjgtYmIzYy00ZmUzLTllNjMtMzA3MDMwMDAxZmQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI1NjYxNjgtYmIzYy00ZmUzLTllNjMtMzA3MDMwMDAxZmQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home video trailer for the final season of this cop show"</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0286486, Title: The Shield, --- Description: The Shield: Created by Shawn Ryan. With Michael Chiklis, Michael Jace, Jay Karnes, CCH Pounder. Follows the lives and cases of a dirty Los Angeles Police Department cop and the unit under his command." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0286486/","name":"The Shield","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTcwNzQwODI5NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzQxMjI5MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follows the lives and cases of a dirty Los Angeles Police Department cop and the unit under his command.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0286486/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"danielcereto","dateCreated":"2020-07-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Shield on 2020","reviewBody":"I just finished this series today on July 2020 and all I have to say is that it does not look cheap, old or non interesting, just keeping in mind this was filmed between 2002-2008. First, most of the main cast are extremely good actors. Vic, Aceveda and Shane were the most powerful. Second, the storyline and the length of the chapters are quite good too. Probably the story could have been told with 4-5 seasons easily. But it is what it is. Last, camera work, make up and sound are pretty cool. I can't believe this show started on 2002. On the other hand, seems some characters were not fully developed or look like the writers didn't want to give them credit. But not a big thing. So, overall if you're looking for an excellent cops show, brutal, raw and almost perfect, this one is for you. Now, I'm going to watch The Wire.
