programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 1874066, Title: Paranormal Witness, --- Description: Paranormal Witness: With Gillian English, Frances Townend, Daniel Cannis, Colin Murphy. A true horror documentary series which brings to life the stories of people who have lived through paranormal experiences that defy explanation." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1874066/","name":"Paranormal Witness","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTZkZTQxZTEtN2VjYi00ZDg3LTlkZDAtMWIzMGNjODcwMzE1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODY0NzcxNw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A true horror documentary series which brings to life the stories of people who have lived through paranormal experiences that defy explanation.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1874066/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"boywonderpowpunch","dateCreated":"2012-08-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Very Scary Show","reviewBody":"I have watched a lot of paranormal shows and in my opinion this one is one of the best. It retells the stories about paranormal events people have experienced by combining re-enacted scenes with real interviews and sometimes real footage. The show is able to create such an eerie and scary atmosphere that you feel like you were there when the event took place. After seeing season 1 episode 1, I had to watch them all. Season 2 should be promising, however I am not sure how I feel about S2E1 this ghost story is familiar to me and I am not quite sure I buy the whole ghost trying to hang a man with a make shift noose in the attic story, I feel this could be a hoax but you never know, they seem very reasonable and truthful people who would not be still lying about something for 20 some years but stranger things have happened.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2605,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8,"genre":["Documentary","Horror","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2011-09-07","keywords":"haunting,poltergeist,two word title,eyewitness account,documentary series","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7025791/","name":"Gillian English","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3266807/","name":"Frances Townend","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3141457/","name":"Daniel Cannis"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0178419/"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Paranormal Witness","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3941252377","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGVkMWY4N2YtM2Y2Zi00OGRiLTkwNDUtOWIxZWM4ZDdkMGY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGVkMWY4N2YtM2Y2Zi00OGRiLTkwNDUtOWIxZWM4ZDdkMGY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Paranormal Witness"</script><metacontent="

A true horror documentary series which brings to life the stories of people who have lived through paranormal experiences that defy explanation." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1874066/","name":"Paranormal Witness","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTZkZTQxZTEtN2VjYi00ZDg3LTlkZDAtMWIzMGNjODcwMzE1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODY0NzcxNw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A true horror documentary series which brings to life the stories of people who have lived through paranormal experiences that defy explanation.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1874066/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"boywonderpowpunch"},"dateCreated":"2012-08-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Very Scary Show","reviewBody":"I have watched a lot of paranormal shows and in my opinion this one is one of the best. It retells the stories about paranormal events people have experienced by combining re-enacted scenes with real interviews and sometimes real footage. The show is able to create such an eerie and scary atmosphere that you feel like you were there when the event took place. After seeing season 1 episode 1, I had to watch them all. Season 2 should be promising, however I am not sure how I feel about S2E1 this ghost story is familiar to me and I am not quite sure I buy the whole ghost trying to hang a man with a make shift noose in the attic story, I feel this could be a hoax but you never know, they seem very reasonable and truthful people who would not be still lying about something for 20 some years but stranger things have happened.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2605,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"genre":["Documentary","Horror","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2011-09-07","keywords":"haunting,poltergeist,two word title,eyewitness account,documentary series","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7025791/","name":"Gillian English"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3266807/","name":"Frances Townend"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3141457/","name":"Daniel Cannis"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0178419/"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Paranormal Witness","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3941252377","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGVkMWY4N2YtM2Y2Zi00OGRiLTkwNDUtOWIxZWM4ZDdkMGY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGVkMWY4N2YtM2Y2Zi00OGRiLTkwNDUtOWIxZWM4ZDdkMGY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Paranormal Witness"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Land of the Lost
Zaginiony ląd
Land of the Lost
programme.desc:
Land of the Lost: Directed by Brad Silberling. With Will Ferrell, Anna Friel, Danny McBride, Jorma Taccone. A space-time vortex sucks scientist Rick Marshall, his assistant Holly and a survivalist Will into a world populated by dinosaurs and painfully slow creatures called Sleestaks." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0457400/","name":"Land of the Lost","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTkzNDg2OTc1NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDcxODE2Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A space-time vortex sucks scientist Rick Marshall, his assistant Holly and a survivalist Will into a world populated by dinosaurs and painfully slow creatures called Sleestaks.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0457400/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kyleson_8"},"dateCreated":"2012-09-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Dang haters","reviewBody":"Many reviews for this will have you thinking this film is terrible, i'm baffled as to why this is the case. The fact of the matter is that this film is fun and well made. 

To get some negatives out of the way first, its definitely got a few obnoxious crude jokes. It also could have been a bit funnier at times. But overall it definitely put me in a good mood, especially because I'm a huge Will Ferrell and Danny McBride fan. I love how Wll Ferrell can deliver such ridiculous lines of dialogue with a straight face. 

Despite being a major Hollywood film, I felt like this film had heart to it and didn't really feel hollow. I know I had already touched on this before but I just don't think all the hate on this movie is justified. It's coherent from beginning to end, all the lines are delivered well and it's very goofy. Not to mention the cgi isn't half bad as well.

Overall it's definitely a fun movie with a few small flaws. Ignore all the hate and go into this with an open mind, not expecting it to be quite like the old TV show, and you'll probably enjoy yourself.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":69195,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.3},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2009-09-30","keywords":"dinosaur,time travel,reference to bob's big boy,bob's big boy restaurant,carnivorous dinosaur","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Land of the Lost: Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4196401945","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjc5MjMyODMxNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDg4NTEzMg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjc5MjMyODMxNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDg4NTEzMg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Here is the final theatrical trailer for Brad Silberling's Land of the Lost."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002071/","name":"Will Ferrell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1144419/","name":"Danny McBride"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0295484/","name":"Anna Friel"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0797869/","name":"Brad Silberling"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0068404/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0376260/","name":"Chris Henchy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0574005/","name":"Dennis McNicholas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0471898/","name":"Sid Krofft"}],"duration":"PT1H42M"}</script><metacontent="

A space-time vortex sucks scientist Rick Marshall, his assistant Holly and a survivalist Will into a world populated by dinosaurs and painfully slow creatures called Sleestaks." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0457400/","name":"Land of the Lost","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTkzNDg2OTc1NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDcxODE2Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A space-time vortex sucks scientist Rick Marshall, his assistant Holly and a survivalist Will into a world populated by dinosaurs and painfully slow creatures called Sleestaks.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0457400/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"kyleson_8","dateCreated":"2012-09-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Dang haters","reviewBody":"Many reviews for this will have you thinking this film is terrible, i'm baffled as to why this is the case. The fact of the matter is that this film is fun and well made. 

To get some negatives out of the way first, its definitely got a few obnoxious crude jokes. It also could have been a bit funnier at times. But overall it definitely put me in a good mood, especially because I'm a huge Will Ferrell and Danny McBride fan. I love how Wll Ferrell can deliver such ridiculous lines of dialogue with a straight face. 

Despite being a major Hollywood film, I felt like this film had heart to it and didn't really feel hollow. I know I had already touched on this before but I just don't think all the hate on this movie is justified. It's coherent from beginning to end, all the lines are delivered well and it's very goofy. Not to mention the cgi isn't half bad as well.

Overall it's definitely a fun movie with a few small flaws. Ignore all the hate and go into this with an open mind, not expecting it to be quite like the old TV show, and you'll probably enjoy yourself.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":69195,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.3,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2009-09-30","keywords":"dinosaur,time travel,reference to bob's big boy,bob's big boy restaurant,carnivorous dinosaur","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Land of the Lost: Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4196401945","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjc5MjMyODMxNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDg4NTEzMg@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjc5MjMyODMxNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDg4NTEzMg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Here is the final theatrical trailer for Brad Silberling's Land of the Lost.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002071/","name":"Will Ferrell","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1144419/","name":"Danny McBride","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0295484/","name":"Anna Friel"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0797869/","name":"Brad Silberling"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0068404/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0376260/","name":"Chris Henchy","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0574005/","name":"Dennis McNicholas","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0471898/","name":"Sid Krofft"],"duration":"PT1H42M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Knowing
Zapowiedź
Knowing
programme.desc:
Knowing: Directed by Alex Proyas. With Nicolas Cage, Chandler Canterbury, Rose Byrne, Lara Robinson. M.I.T. professor John Koestler links a mysterious list of numbers from a time capsule to past and future disasters and sets out to prevent the ultimate catastrophe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0448011/","name":"Knowing","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMyMjgyMDIyM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjg3MjAyMg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"M.I.T. professor John Koestler links a mysterious list of numbers from a time capsule to past and future disasters and sets out to prevent the ultimate catastrophe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0448011/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"treadwaywrites"},"dateCreated":"2009-03-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Worth Seeing  Before the End!","reviewBody":"From the trailers of Knowing you'd be convinced that you're going to watch a cheesy, try to save the world picture with a wound tight Nicolas Cage at the center gritting his teeth and ducking his way to the perfect ending. Well, you'd be partially correct. Cage is definitely giving his wound tight hero routine that he's worked so hard to develop over the last half dozen films. As for the cheese factor, that's where you'll be surprised. Director Alex Proyas manages to deliver a rather decent sci-fi flick that has plenty of suspense and intelligence.

The plot turns around John Koestler (Nicolas Cage), an MIT astrophysics nerd turned Indiana Jones when a time capsule is discovered at his young son Caleb's (Chandler Canterbury) school. Inside are drawings from students in 1959 predicting what things would be like in 2009 some 50 years later. The drawing that Caleb comes home with isn't a drawing at all but a series of seemingly random numbers. Koestler becomes obsessed with the numbers and their meaning or what they seem to mean. The whole thing shakes him to his scientific core and a quest has begun.

The film is very lucky to have director Alex Proyas from films such as Dark City which is his true geek film and critical acclaim as well as I, Robot and Garage Days. The visual and special effects are outstanding. It was surprising how much suspense was in the script (Ryan Douglas Pearson and Juliet Snowden) which gave the film a real thriller atmosphere which continues to build in tone as the mystery is unraveled. 

I admit I went into this film expecting a rehash of National Treasure on a more global scale. The sci-fi aspect of the premise is very well thought out and told. The acting by co-stars (Chandler Canterbury, Rose Byrne and Lara Robinson) are solid performances and stand in complementary contrast to that of the tightly wound Nicolas Cage. The geek factor of Knowing is rather high with lots of number configurations and what-if scenarios which is great for the sci-fi fans. At times your brain may have to turn on in order to follow the film, but that is what made Knowing such a pleasant surprise to me.*","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":228642,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Drama","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2009-04-22","keywords":"end of the world,number,disaster,time capsule,code","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Knowing: TV Spot","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3391554329","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzI1NDU5OTYzNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTU4NjYzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzI1NDU5OTYzNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTU4NjYzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Here is the TV trailer for Knowing, directed by Alex Proyas and starring Nicholas Cage."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000115/","name":"Nicolas Cage"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2425105/","name":"Chandler Canterbury"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0126284/","name":"Rose Byrne"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001639/","name":"Alex Proyas"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046206/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0035535/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0052515/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0669379/","name":"Ryne Douglas Pearson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1340000/","name":"Juliet Snowden"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0925482/","name":"Stiles White"}],"duration":"PT2H1M"}</script><metacontent="

The drawing that Caleb comes home with isn't a drawing at all but a series of seemingly random numbers. Koestler becomes obsessed with the numbers and their meaning or what they seem to mean. The whole thing shakes him to his scientific core and a quest has begun.

The film is very lucky to have director Alex Proyas from films such as Dark City which is his true geek film and critical acclaim as well as I, Robot and Garage Days. The visual and special effects are outstanding. It was surprising how much suspense was in the script (Ryan Douglas Pearson and Juliet Snowden) which gave the film a real thriller atmosphere which continues to build in tone as the mystery is unraveled. 

I admit I went into this film expecting a rehash of National Treasure on a more global scale. The sci-fi aspect of the premise is very well thought out and told. The acting by co-stars (Chandler Canterbury, Rose Byrne and Lara Robinson) are solid performances and stand in complementary contrast to that of the tightly wound Nicolas Cage. The geek factor of Knowing is rather high with lots of number configurations and what-if scenarios which is great for the sci-fi fans. At times your brain may have to turn on in order to follow the film, but that is what made Knowing such a pleasant surprise to me.*","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":228642,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Drama","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2009-04-22","keywords":"end of the world,number,disaster,time capsule,code","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Knowing: TV Spot","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3391554329","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzI1NDU5OTYzNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTU4NjYzMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzI1NDU5OTYzNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTU4NjYzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Here is the TV trailer for Knowing, directed by Alex Proyas and starring Nicholas Cage.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000115/","name":"Nicolas Cage","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2425105/","name":"Chandler Canterbury","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0126284/","name":"Rose Byrne"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001639/","name":"Alex Proyas"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046206/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0035535/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0052515/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0669379/","name":"Ryne Douglas Pearson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1340000/","name":"Juliet Snowden","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0925482/","name":"Stiles White"],"duration":"PT2H1M"</script><metacontent="

https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMyMjgyMDIyM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjg3MjAyMg@@._V1_QL75_UX190_CR0,0,190,281_.jpg

programme.title: Twister
Twister
programme.desc: Twister: Directed by Jan de Bont. With Helen Hunt, Bill Paxton, Cary Elwes, Jami Gertz. Bill and Jo Harding, advanced storm chasers on the brink of divorce, must join together to create an advanced weather alert system by putting themselves in the cross-hairs of extremely violent tornadoes." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0117998/","name":"Twister","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODExYTM0MzEtZGY2Yy00N2ExLTkwZjItNGYzYTRmMWZlOGEzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDk3NzU2MTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Bill and Jo Harding, advanced storm chasers on the brink of divorce, must join together to create an advanced weather alert system by putting themselves in the cross-hairs of extremely violent tornadoes.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0117998/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"billybob-8"},"dateCreated":"1999-03-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"My all-time favorite.","reviewBody":"Hey people come on! Give TWISTER another chance! Films, even action films, don't HAVE to have "an inventive plot" or "decent performances" or "a script that wasn't written by a machine" to be "good." All I need is light, noise, and lotsa 'splosions! Take those elements and paste over a thin layer of worn-out story borrowed from 10 or twelve other movies and you got a winner, thank you! Throw in some great acting-Bill Paxton's "staring at the dirt" moment alone FLOORS me. And ever notice how Helen Hunt is constantly bustling about with her head down whenever she's not scrunching her face into her patented "I'm sad and cute" look (Hello Oscar!)-that's ACTING! And Jamie Gertz! Welcome back to the cinema! I haven't seen you since LISTEN TO ME! And don't even get me started on the lovable ragamuffins known as the "storm chasers"! The way they're thrown at us like we'll immediately love them! The way you're not sure how many of them there are! (And the fat red-hared "dude"! That's what they mean by COOL! I mean COOL-AGE!) And Cary Elwes! What a great villian! He's in it for the money!(Hsss!) At first I wasn't sure what accent he was doing, since it changed every scene, but then I realized he was doing all of them! And the F/X! WOWWW!!! This movie follows the rule "We got a computer, who needs a script?". I love how the characters "find" the big tornado in the end-on a perfectly sunny day, no less-and drive right up to it with no damage done! I can't wait to try that myself! (I just hope I have lots of cans of delicious refreshing Pepsi-Cola(TM)!!!)\n\nTo sum up, this is a rollercoaster wrapped inside a thrillride of a movie and I implore you to give a second chance! Please don't get hung up on this notion that a big budget action film could actually be daring and original and even a little smart. All we need are CGIs and THX sound and films made by the marketing department of the studios to keep us happy! Give me more! I'm waiting!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":189117,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1996-05-10","keywords":"crashing a car into a house,drive in theater,drive in movie,storm chaser,disaster","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Twister","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2145386777","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTc2MTEzMDAtOGVmNS00MjYxLWFiZWMtYTkwMmFkYjk5OGUxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTc2MTEzMDAtOGVmNS00MjYxLWFiZWMtYTkwMmFkYjk5OGUxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Warner Home Video"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000166/","name":"Helen Hunt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000200/","name":"Bill Paxton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000144/","name":"Cary Elwes"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000957/","name":"Jan de Bont"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0009119/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000341/","name":"Michael Crichton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0551926/","name":"Anne-Marie Martin"}],"duration":"PT1H53M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Recruit
Jądro Ziemi
The Core
programme.desc:
The Recruit: Directed by Roger Donaldson. With Al Pacino, Colin Farrell, Bridget Moynahan, Gabriel Macht. A brilliant young CIA trainee is asked by his mentor to help find a mole in the Agency." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0292506/","name":"The Recruit","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE5MDMzOTk3MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNTE0NTg2._V1_.jpg","description":"A brilliant young CIA trainee is asked by his mentor to help find a mole in the Agency.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0292506/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"he_who_leads"},"dateCreated":"2007-05-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Everything is a Test!!! That's a Good and Bad Thing.","reviewBody":"'The Recruit,' is an MIT whiz kid James Clayton (Colin Farrel). His recruiter is CIA guy Walter Burke (Al Pacino). He is the head guy at the CIA training centre, 'the farm,' which Clayton and fellow trainee/love interest Layla Moore (Bridget Moynahan) go through.

The movie is good enough to watch but is not entirely riveting. You see, we are told 'everything is a test!!!' and this lurks behind every plot turn that Clayton goes through. Are his problems for real? Or is it just another training test by Burke? If this sounds like tense stuff, it is and it isn't. Sometimes it will hook you in but other times it is just annoying - the feeling that he's not in any real danger but its all just a drill. Interest goes up and down until after the 'farm' training stuff. At this point, the story's focus gets much sharper and things become more consistently interesting, with a few cool twists. This is quite a fair way into the movie, though.

I love Pacino, and was quite interested in whether Farrell could match him after the promise he showed in 'Minority Report.' Well he does. In fact, everyone holds their own and the combined chemistry boosts the film. Pacino is steady throughout and doesn't do his unrestrained thing until the end (its still worth the wait!). Also, Moynahan is thankfully given more to do than just be the obligatory chick/eye-candy.

Overall, decent enough to give a whirl. It's better than most of the other spy / thriller stuff out there.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":133324,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2003-04-30","keywords":"recruit,training,watching tv,jefferson memorial,smithsonian institute","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Recruit","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi499253529","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDlhYTM4ZWItOTE3OC00ZjVkLWI0OWMtOTUxZGIxMDljZGU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDlhYTM4ZWItOTE3OC00ZjVkLWI0OWMtOTUxZGIxMDljZGU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"CT #2 Post"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000199/","name":"Al Pacino"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0268199/","name":"Colin Farrell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005256/","name":"Bridget Moynahan"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002044/","name":"Roger Donaldson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049348/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0031181/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0166202/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0870013/","name":"Roger Towne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0934483/","name":"Kurt Wimmer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0322248/","name":"Mitch Glazer"}],"duration":"PT1H55M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Chronicles of Riddick
Kroniki Riddicka
The Chronicles of Riddick
programme.desc: The Chronicles of Riddick: Directed by David Twohy. With Vin Diesel, Colm Feore, Thandiwe Newton, Judi Dench. The wanted criminal Richard Bruno Riddick (Vin Diesel) arrives on a planet called Helion Prime and finds himself up against an invading empire called the Necromongers, an army that plans to convert or kill all humans in the universe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0296572/","name":"The Chronicles of Riddick","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzBjNmJkYjUtMTFjMC00ZWI5LWEyM2YtNzczOTczMmM1ODY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzQ1ODk3MTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"The wanted criminal Richard Bruno Riddick (Vin Diesel) arrives on a planet called Helion Prime and finds himself up against an invading empire called the Necromongers, an army that plans to convert or kill all humans in the universe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0296572/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mjohnston10-1"},"dateCreated":"2005-03-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Scifi action flick","reviewBody":"I would also like to comment on the fact that TCOR received bad reviews. Personally, I think that Vin Diesel should continue making the movies from the other screenplays that have already been written. The plot in these films (TCOR and Pitch Black) is actually quite original. From an action standpoint, the films do not lack anything. Riddick is the bad ass anti-hero that we would all like to be sometimes and they couldn't have cast the parts any better. There are some similarities between the Necros in TCOR and the Borg in the latter Star Trek movies, but who cares? David Twohy put a great spin on the Necro collective and I am eagerly awaiting another sequel. Anyone who likes Scifi and enjoys fantastic visuals will love this movie.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":222279,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2004-09-22","keywords":"shared universe,actor reprises previous role,movie flop,timeframe 27th century,warrior","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004874/","name":"Vin Diesel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001132/","name":"Judi Dench"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0272173/","name":"Colm Feore"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0878638/","name":"David Twohy"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023815/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0026886/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0923646/","name":"Jim Wheat"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003117/","name":"Ken Wheat"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0878638/","name":"David Twohy"}],"duration":"PT1H59M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0296572, Title: The Chronicles of Riddick, --- Description: The Chronicles of Riddick: Directed by David Twohy. With Vin Diesel, Colm Feore, Thandiwe Newton, Judi Dench. The wanted criminal Richard Bruno Riddick (Vin Diesel) arrives on a planet called Helion Prime and finds himself up against an invading empire called the Necromongers, an army that plans to convert or kill all humans in the universe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0296572/","name":"The Chronicles of Riddick","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzBjNmJkYjUtMTFjMC00ZWI5LWEyM2YtNzczOTczMmM1ODY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzQ1ODk3MTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"The wanted criminal Richard Bruno Riddick (Vin Diesel) arrives on a planet called Helion Prime and finds himself up against an invading empire called the Necromongers, an army that plans to convert or kill all humans in the universe.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0296572/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"mjohnston10-1","dateCreated":"2005-03-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Scifi action flick","reviewBody":"I would also like to comment on the fact that TCOR received bad reviews. Personally, I think that Vin Diesel should continue making the movies from the other screenplays that have already been written. The plot in these films (TCOR and Pitch Black) is actually quite original. From an action standpoint, the films do not lack anything. Riddick is the bad ass anti-hero that we would all like to be sometimes and they couldn't have cast the parts any better. There are some similarities between the Necros in TCOR and the Borg in the latter Star Trek movies, but who cares? David Twohy put a great spin on the Necro collective and I am eagerly awaiting another sequel. Anyone who likes Scifi and enjoys fantastic visuals will love this movie.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":222279,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2004-09-22","keywords":"shared universe,actor reprises previous role,movie flop,timeframe 27th century,warrior","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004874/","name":"Vin Diesel","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001132/","name":"Judi Dench","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0272173/","name":"Colm Feore"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0878638/","name":"David Twohy"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023815/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0026886/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0923646/","name":"Jim Wheat","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003117/","name":"Ken Wheat","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0878638/","name":"David Twohy"],"duration":"PT1H59M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Flight
programme.desc: Nimm dich in acht, Purgatory! Ein mächtiger Feind kehrt ins 'Ghost River Triangle' zurück und ist fest entschlossen, seinen tödlichen Plan zu Ende zu bringen.

programme.title: SYFY Inside: Krypton - Die besten der Bösen
Tarantula
programme.desc: Als der Geschäftsführer Blake Creighton (Michael Therriault) eines Morgens tot in seiner Wohnung aufgefunden wird, wird der Fall an Detective Jules Dover (Lisa Marcos) und ihre Partnerin, die virtuelle Intelligenz Asha (Harveen Sandhu), übergeben. Die ersten Befunde zeigen eindeutig, dass die Todesursache Strangulation gewesen sein muss. Doch Detective Dover und Asha finden keinerlei Hinweise auf Einwirkung von außen. Es scheint, als wäre Creighton ermordet worden, ohne vom Täter auch nur berührt worden zu sein. Syfy zeigt alle 10 Episoden von Halcyon in der Spielfilmfassung.

programme.title: SYFY Inside: Krypton
programme.desc: Der 'Puddel Jumper One' gerät auf einer Mission in Schwierigkeiten. Wegen eines Defekts ist die Crew gezwungen, auf einem ihr unbekannten Planeten zu landen. Dort treffen Major John Sheppard (Joe Flanigan), Lieutenant Ford (Rainbow Sun Francks), Dr. McKay (David Hewlett) und Teyla (Rachel Luttrell) nur junge Menschen. Offenbar herrscht auf dem Himmelskörper eine solch große Angst vor den Wraith, dass alle Bewohner vor ihrem 25. Geburtstag ihr Leben opfern.

programme.title: Szczesliwego Nowego Jorku
Szczęśliwego Nowego Jorku
programme.desc: Szczesliwego Nowego Jorku: Directed by Janusz Zaorski. With Boguslaw Linda, Zbigniew Zamachowski, Janusz Gajos, Cezary Pazura. The story of six Polish emigrants living in New York City, who try to live their American Dream and cope with the realities of the Big Apple." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0120261/","name":"Szczesliwego Nowego Jorku","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWI3YzhjYzYtOGUzNy00MDdiLWEwNzMtYjU5NDc0YzY2NDRiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of six Polish emigrants living in New York City, who try to live their American Dream and cope with the realities of the Big Apple.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0120261/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"tadeusz-luksusowyjacht"},"dateCreated":"2009-08-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"The best","reviewBody":"The story follows a group of people from the country in the east. They lived their lives, regular, gray, everyday existence. Now, one day somebody decided to change the world, to make it better place. So the lives of our group have changed. The morning was still morning, evening was evening but somehow the rest was different. So they had to find a new place to live. They went west, to the place of eternal happiness and beauty. But when they get there, it turned out that the "paradise" was just as gray, dirty, stinky as their world.\n\nSo, if you ever had to leave your country looking for better life, just because somebody decided that old is bad and new is good, see this movie! But !! If you live your life just like coca cola commercial - thinking that polar bears play joyfully with seals - I dare you, do not! It is simply The Best movie I ever saw. Acting, screenplay, dialogs - top notch, life itself.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":738,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"1997-09-26","keywords":"masturbation,american dream,emigration","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0511277/","name":"Boguslaw Linda"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0952498/","name":"Zbigniew Zamachowski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0301515/","name":"Janusz Gajos"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0953147/","name":"Janusz Zaorski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0714981/","name":"Edward Redlinski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0953147/","name":"Janusz Zaorski"}],"duration":"PT1H35M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Vabank
Vabank
programme.desc:
Vabank: Directed by Juliusz Machulski. With Jan Machulski, Leonard Pietraszak, Witold Pyrkosz, Ewa Szykulska. Set in Warsaw in 1930's. After six years in jail, framed for bank robbery by an accomplice, the legendary Kwinto has only revenge on his mind. He is a safecracker in the old style, a thief with a sense of pride and loyalty. Upon leaving the jail he learns that his friend with whom he played in the jazz band has been murdered by the same guy - now a bank president - who sent him to prison. Kramer hopes to keep Kwinto's mouth shut by paying him off, but at the same time he hires a paid gun to kill him. Meanwhile, some young, petty crooks hearing that Kwinto is free want to join forces with him for a job. Kwinto, employing a retired professional and two young admirers, pulls his last job to get even with Kramer..." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0083271/","name":"Vabank","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWY1NjhiNGYtN2U3MS00NjBkLWE3MGMtYWZjMTVmY2RlZTMwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjMwOTA0Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Set in Warsaw in 1930's. After six years in jail, framed for bank robbery by an accomplice, the legendary Kwinto has only revenge on his mind. He is a safecracker in the old style, a thief with a sense of pride and loyalty. Upon leav","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0083271/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Maziun"},"dateCreated":"2013-11-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"Polish The Sting"","reviewBody":"This is a debut movie from Juliusz Machulski , Polish director who is in Poland often called "Polish Spielberg" . He specialize in making comedies and "Vabank" is one of his best movies. It's a movie about con artists set in Warsaw in the 30's , before World War II.

The movie was made in the 80's in Poland during the communism , so the budget wasn't too big and the art-direction might look a little cheap for modern audiences . It's the script that is the star of movie . Full of Polish brisk humor and many small twists it's a pleasure to watch . The final is really surprising . It's also interesting that main hero is played by Jan Machulski father of the director and that the opening credits appear after 7 minutes of the movie.

Add to that a good direction , professional acting (good Jan Machulski as the hero , great Leonard Pietraszak as the villain) , elegant and catchy music by Henryk Kuźniar and a lot of charm – "Vabank" is must see for all movie lovers .

I give it 8/10.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4256,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.9},"genre":["Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"1982-03-01","keywords":"ex convict,frame up,one word title,october 1934,jeweler","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0532701/","name":"Jan Machulski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0682893/","name":"Leonard Pietraszak"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0701568/","name":"Witold Pyrkosz"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0532702/","name":"Juliusz Machulski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0016599/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0532702/","name":"Juliusz Machulski"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Vabank II, czyli riposta
Vabank II, czyli riposta
programme.desc:
Vabank II, czyli riposta: Directed by Juliusz Machulski. With Jan Machulski, Leonard Pietraszak, Witold Pyrkosz, Bronislaw Wroclawski. Convict Kramer manages to escape from prison. Before leaving for Switzerland, he wants to take revenge on Kwinto, the man who sent him to jail." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0090246/","name":"Vabank II, czyli riposta","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTg5ODcyYTEtM2U5OS00YjNkLWE5MzMtODcwZjU5ZjI5NmU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjMwOTA0Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Convict Kramer manages to escape from prison. Before leaving for Switzerland, he wants to take revenge on Kwinto, the man who sent him to jail.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0090246/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Maziun"},"dateCreated":"2013-08-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Routine sequel","reviewBody":""Vabank 2" is a sequel that follows the formula of the first movie . It's not strange that in the end the movie isn't as half surprising or funny as the original . It's more predictable and there aren't any interesting new characters . It seems that Machulski (writer and director ) has run out of ideas . The movie is quite surprising in the first 40 minutes . Later , it goes into standard and predictable territory : a bait , a trap and a repeat of the final of first movie.

Still it's an OK sequel . There are some good jokes here . The music is as elegant and catchy as before and acting is still good . I would only complain about performance of Jacek Chmielnik (Moks) . He's overacting so much that I was annoyed every time he was on screen. In his defense he signs really well the Vabank song that appears here. The song is really cool and to be honest that's the only really new element here.

It's no match for the first one , but still a watchable sequel. By the way , IMDb is wrong. This movie was made in 1984 , not 1985.I give it 5/10.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2558,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"genre":["Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"1985-05-06","keywords":"switzerland,safecracker,nazi,gang,border guard","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0532701/","name":"Jan Machulski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0682893/","name":"Leonard Pietraszak"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0701568/","name":"Witold Pyrkosz"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0532702/","name":"Juliusz Machulski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0016599/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0532702/","name":"Juliusz Machulski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0644038/","name":"Urs Odermatt"}],"duration":"PT1H37M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Seksmisja
Seksmisja
programme.desc:
Seksmisja: Directed by Juliusz Machulski. With Wieslaw Michnikowski, Jerzy Stuhr, Olgierd Lukaszewicz, Dorota Stalinska. Two scientists are placed in hibernation and should be awaken after three years. But when they wake up, it turns out that it has been fifty years, and they are the only two males in a new, underground society composed exclusively of women." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0088083/","name":"Seksmisja","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FjYTg3ZGUtZGMzMS00ZjQ3LTgxYjYtYzgzOTRjZDQ5MDY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg3MTIwODI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two scientists are placed in hibernation and should be awaken after three years. But when they wake up, it turns out that it has been fifty years, and they are the only two males in a new, underground society composed exclusively of ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0088083/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"varberg"},"dateCreated":"2004-08-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Cultic Polish sci-fi satire","reviewBody":"I must admit that I haven't seen many movies made in Poland (shame, but not many are played here...), but this one is a real gem, which achieved cult status in this region.

The story is about two men who are hibernated for 3 years for showing "the victory of mankind over time", but wake up 53 years later in society ruled by women. Men are extinct, all living men were killed by a bomb and the surviving women have to leave under the Earth's surface in complexes. One of the women says: "Encounter with men are areal". Our heroes don't panic however... they have only one goal: re-establishing somehow the old regime. Not an easy task, considering they are the only men alive, surrounded by man-hating ("man-eating"), fanatic women whose goal is either to naturalize or to kill them.

One can't forget that this movie was made in 1984 when communism was in its place and didn't seem to melt yet. Nowadays I wonder a bit that it was allowed to show in the cinemas, because this movie is a perfect satire of any totaliarist regime (including communism) and blind fanaticism. There is very subtle humor between the lines and this humor is what makes this movie a cult movie. However serious the theme, the movie catches the mood and the movements so easily and with such wit that you can't help but laugh. Making fun of something is the best way to criticize it and Seksmisja is a perfect example.

This movie is highly recommended for anyone in the world. Seeing it only once isn't enough... to get the whole idea and the subtler humor, you have to watch it several times. If you want to enjoy it fully, get the original Polish version with subtitles.

"Someone hurts you? You're in trouble? You can count on Women's Council!""},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12838,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"1984-05-14","keywords":"post apocalypse,pubic hair,female full frontal nudity,female rear nudity,cross dressing","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4224959257","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjZlZGM1YzYtYmI2Yi00NDYyLWJkNzgtNzk0YTA1NWUwYTU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQWRpZWdtb25n._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjZlZGM1YzYtYmI2Yi00NDYyLWJkNzgtNzk0YTA1NWUwYTU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQWRpZWdtb25n._V1_.jpg","description":"Two scientists are placed in hibernation and should be awaken after three years. But when they wake up, it turns out that it has been fifty years, and they are the only two males in a new, underground society composed exclusively of women."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0585239/","name":"Wieslaw Michnikowski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0836136/","name":"Jerzy Stuhr"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0525557/","name":"Olgierd Lukaszewicz"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0532702/","name":"Juliusz Machulski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0016599/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0532702/","name":"Juliusz Machulski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0354525/","name":"Pavel Hajný"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0367308/","name":"Jolanta Hartwig"}],"duration":"PT1H57M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Brunet wieczorowa pora: Directed by Stanislaw Bareja. With Krzysztof Kowalewski, Wojciech Pokora, Janina Traczykówna, Wieslaw Golas. Modest editor, has shipped his wife and kids for the weekend, and is trying to relax in his house at the outskirts of Warsaw. His quiet evening is only disturbed by the accidental forecast made by a Gypsy woman, that at evening time he will murder a mysterious brunet. He is trying to escape the destiny, but to no avail..." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0074251/","name":"Brunet wieczorowa pora","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWI2MjQzNjktMzM1Ny00NjJiLThkMjAtMmQ4YWFiNWZlZWRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjIxMzk1NA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Modest editor, has shipped his wife and kids for the weekend, and is trying to relax in his house at the outskirts of Warsaw. His quiet evening is only disturbed by the accidental forecast made by a Gypsy woman, that at evening time ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0074251/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"tml_pohlak_13"},"dateCreated":"2007-11-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"An entertaining comedy!","reviewBody":"A Polish editor sends away his wife and kids and is hoping for a peaceful weekend. His night passes uneventfully, until the lights fuse. As he fixes them, a Gypsy knocks at his window. She predicts, amongst other things, that he will kill a man with brown hair accidentally the next evening. The next day is filled with surprises, as each of the Gypsy's predictions come true. The hero becomes more and more uneasy. Then, the evening comes, and a knock sounds at his door. (But it is only two carol singers whom he pays money willingly.) After sending them away, he sits down, and as he is about to relax, he hears a noise. He looks up, and sees....\n\nThis is overall an amazing comedy, which is really entertaining. This is my favourite Polish comedy.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1436,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"genre":["Comedy","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1976-10-18","keywords":"satire,absurdism,written by director,omen,gypsy","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0468586/","name":"Krzysztof Kowalewski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0688684/","name":"Wojciech Pokora"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0870576/","name":"Janina Traczykówna"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0054402/","name":"Stanislaw Bareja"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0037432/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0054402/","name":"Stanislaw Bareja"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0878957/","name":"Stanislaw Tym"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Szczesliwego Nowego Jorku: Directed by Janusz Zaorski. With Boguslaw Linda, Zbigniew Zamachowski, Janusz Gajos, Cezary Pazura. The story of six Polish emigrants living in New York City, who try to live their American Dream and cope with the realities of the Big Apple." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0120261/","name":"Szczesliwego Nowego Jorku","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWI3YzhjYzYtOGUzNy00MDdiLWEwNzMtYjU5NDc0YzY2NDRiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of six Polish emigrants living in New York City, who try to live their American Dream and cope with the realities of the Big Apple.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0120261/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"tadeusz-luksusowyjacht"},"dateCreated":"2009-08-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"The best","reviewBody":"The story follows a group of people from the country in the east. They lived their lives, regular, gray, everyday existence. Now, one day somebody decided to change the world, to make it better place. So the lives of our group have changed. The morning was still morning, evening was evening but somehow the rest was different. So they had to find a new place to live. They went west, to the place of eternal happiness and beauty. But when they get there, it turned out that the "paradise" was just as gray, dirty, stinky as their world.\n\nSo, if you ever had to leave your country looking for better life, just because somebody decided that old is bad and new is good, see this movie! But !! If you live your life just like coca cola commercial - thinking that polar bears play joyfully with seals - I dare you, do not! It is simply The Best movie I ever saw. Acting, screenplay, dialogs - top notch, life itself.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":738,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"1997-09-26","keywords":"masturbation,american dream,emigration","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0511277/","name":"Boguslaw Linda"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0952498/","name":"Zbigniew Zamachowski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0301515/","name":"Janusz Gajos"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0953147/","name":"Janusz Zaorski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0714981/","name":"Edward Redlinski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0953147/","name":"Janusz Zaorski"}],"duration":"PT1H35M"}</script><metacontent="

Brunet wieczorową porą
programme.desc: Brunet wieczorowa pora: Directed by Stanislaw Bareja. With Krzysztof Kowalewski, Wojciech Pokora, Janina Traczykówna, Wieslaw Golas. Modest editor, has shipped his wife and kids for the weekend, and is trying to relax in his house at the outskirts of Warsaw. His quiet evening is only disturbed by the accidental forecast made by a Gypsy woman, that at evening time he will murder a mysterious brunet. He is trying to escape the destiny, but to no avail..." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0074251/","name":"Brunet wieczorowa pora","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWI2MjQzNjktMzM1Ny00NjJiLThkMjAtMmQ4YWFiNWZlZWRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjIxMzk1NA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Modest editor, has shipped his wife and kids for the weekend, and is trying to relax in his house at the outskirts of Warsaw. His quiet evening is only disturbed by the accidental forecast made by a Gypsy woman, that at evening time ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0074251/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"tml_pohlak_13"},"dateCreated":"2007-11-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"An entertaining comedy!","reviewBody":"A Polish editor sends away his wife and kids and is hoping for a peaceful weekend. His night passes uneventfully, until the lights fuse. As he fixes them, a Gypsy knocks at his window. She predicts, amongst other things, that he will kill a man with brown hair accidentally the next evening. The next day is filled with surprises, as each of the Gypsy's predictions come true. The hero becomes more and more uneasy. Then, the evening comes, and a knock sounds at his door. (But it is only two carol singers whom he pays money willingly.) After sending them away, he sits down, and as he is about to relax, he hears a noise. He looks up, and sees....\n\nThis is overall an amazing comedy, which is really entertaining. This is my favourite Polish comedy.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1436,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"genre":["Comedy","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1976-10-18","keywords":"satire,absurdism,written by director,omen,gypsy","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0468586/","name":"Krzysztof Kowalewski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0688684/","name":"Wojciech Pokora"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0870576/","name":"Janina Traczykówna"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0054402/","name":"Stanislaw Bareja"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0037432/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0054402/","name":"Stanislaw Bareja"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0878957/","name":"Stanislaw Tym"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

credits.actor: Stanisław Mikulski, Emil Karewicz, Bronisław Pawlik, Leon Niemczyk, Tadeusz Teodorczyk, Krzysztof Chamiec, Wiesława Mazurkiewicz, Barbara Horawianka, Władysław Hańcza

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 0065035, Title: Stawka wieksza niz zycie, --- Description: Stawka wieksza niz zycie: With Stanislaw Mikulski, Emil Karewicz, Bronislaw Pawlik, Gustaw Lutkiewicz. Stanislaw Kolicki is a spy who operates as Hans Kloss in the Nazi Abwehr during the second World War." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0065035/","name":"Stawka wieksza niz zycie","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTU3YzRkNmUtOTQ2Ni00ODUxLThjNTYtM2JjYTJjZDFkZGEzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Stanislaw Kolicki is a spy who operates as Hans Kloss in the Nazi Abwehr during the second World War.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0065035/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"brzostek","dateCreated":"2012-06-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"a Polish television series about a Polish spy deep in the ranks of Abwehr","reviewBody":"More than Life at Stake (Stawka wieksza niz zycie) is a Polish television series about a Polish spy deep in the ranks of Abwehr (German military intelligence) during World War II. The first episode sets the stage for this 18 episode series. After the Russians capture a German spy by the name of Hans Kloss, they spend a great deal of time interrogating him about the smallest details of his life. The German spy is replaced with a Polish look-a-like named Janek (Stanislaw Mikulski), and his "escape" is staged to have several German witnesses that will confirm his identity as a German officer. Hans Kloss provides intelligence and assistance to other spies he is aligned with and, more significantly, creates an environment in which the Germans are all suspecting each other of being a traitor, thus crushing their morale.

Hans Kloss gets himself into countless sticky situations, which nearly take a miracle to untangle from. Each episode has mystery and keeps one guessing how it will turn out until the very end. Although there is no major carryover in the storyline between each episode, there are more than a number of small details that find their way into the next installments.

The entire story takes place from 1943 to 1945, and we see Germany at its height of power to its gradual fall. The part that I found especially interesting are the final days of the war, when the tables were turned and the days of the Germany's power where numbered. The fear they inspired in others is now something they had to deal with themselves. I also found it interesting that it showed some of the German officers were positioning themselves to look favorable with the Americans hoping to find a haven with them (which has been confirmed a number of times with declassified information but isn't widely known).

More than Life at Stake is a classic Polish television show that has remained popular since its creation in 1967-1968 (and probably will for many years in the future). The episodes are alternately directed by Andrzej Konic or Janusz Morgenstern. Hans Kloss is a cultural icon that is probably just as popular as Czterej pancerni i pies, which was also made in the late 1960s. Furthermore, even though Stawka wieksza niz zycie was made during the period of Soviet occupation of Poland, there is less pro-communist sentiment than Czterej pancerni i pies and even portrays the AK favorably. More than Life at Stake is an exceptional WWII serial, particularly for those who like the espionage side to the story.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":794,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7,"genre":["Action","War"],"datePublished":"1968-10-10","keywords":"nazi,spy,cult,world war two","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0586725/","name":"Stanislaw Mikulski","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0439202/","name":"Emil Karewicz","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0668037/","name":"Bronislaw Pawlik"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049230/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0098526/"]</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Seksmisja
Seksmisja
programme.desc:
Seksmisja: Directed by Juliusz Machulski. With Wieslaw Michnikowski, Jerzy Stuhr, Olgierd Lukaszewicz, Dorota Stalinska. Two scientists are placed in hibernation and should be awaken after three years. But when they wake up, it turns out that it has been fifty years, and they are the only two males in a new, underground society composed exclusively of women." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0088083/","name":"Seksmisja","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FjYTg3ZGUtZGMzMS00ZjQ3LTgxYjYtYzgzOTRjZDQ5MDY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg3MTIwODI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two scientists are placed in hibernation and should be awaken after three years. But when they wake up, it turns out that it has been fifty years, and they are the only two males in a new, underground society composed exclusively of ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0088083/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"varberg"},"dateCreated":"2004-08-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Cultic Polish sci-fi satire","reviewBody":"I must admit that I haven't seen many movies made in Poland (shame, but not many are played here...), but this one is a real gem, which achieved cult status in this region.

The story is about two men who are hibernated for 3 years for showing "the victory of mankind over time", but wake up 53 years later in society ruled by women. Men are extinct, all living men were killed by a bomb and the surviving women have to leave under the Earth's surface in complexes. One of the women says: "Encounter with men are areal". Our heroes don't panic however... they have only one goal: re-establishing somehow the old regime. Not an easy task, considering they are the only men alive, surrounded by man-hating ("man-eating"), fanatic women whose goal is either to naturalize or to kill them.

One can't forget that this movie was made in 1984 when communism was in its place and didn't seem to melt yet. Nowadays I wonder a bit that it was allowed to show in the cinemas, because this movie is a perfect satire of any totaliarist regime (including communism) and blind fanaticism. There is very subtle humor between the lines and this humor is what makes this movie a cult movie. However serious the theme, the movie catches the mood and the movements so easily and with such wit that you can't help but laugh. Making fun of something is the best way to criticize it and Seksmisja is a perfect example.

This movie is highly recommended for anyone in the world. Seeing it only once isn't enough... to get the whole idea and the subtler humor, you have to watch it several times. If you want to enjoy it fully, get the original Polish version with subtitles.

"Someone hurts you? You're in trouble? But when they wake up, it turns out that it has been fifty years, and they are the only two males in a new, underground society composed exclusively of women."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0585239/","name":"Wieslaw Michnikowski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0836136/","name":"Jerzy Stuhr"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0525557/","name":"Olgierd Lukaszewicz"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0532702/","name":"Juliusz Machulski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0016599/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0532702/","name":"Juliusz Machulski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0354525/","name":"Pavel Hajný"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0367308/","name":"Jolanta Hartwig"}],"duration":"PT1H57M"}</script><metacontent="
